subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * <big>⿳{{l|mul|[[宀]][[⻀]][[見]]}}</big> - Contains <big>[[⻀]]</big> ''(ram's horn)'' instead of {{l|mul|艹}} ''(grass radical)'' - See derived characters below.

subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[𭳈]]}} ''(Contains'' {{l|mul|⿳[[宀]][[艹]][[見]]}}, ''grass radical)'' * {{l|mul|[[𡣚]], [[𬞸]]}} ''(Contains'' {{l|mul|⿳[[宀]][[⻀]][[見]]}}, ''ram's horn)'' * {{l|mul|[[𡬘]]}} ''(Contains'' {{l|mul|⿳[[宀]][[⻀]][[見]]}}, ''ram's horn. Exception: Only for its {{w|CJK Compatibility Ideographs|compatibility form}}'' (U+2F871))
